snippet.title: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Look for the Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy, which features the first three games in the beloved courtroom action series, on the Nintendo 3DS eShop this winter!

Redrawn high-res visuals, 3D support, lovable characters, memorable courtroom gameplay, and both English AND Japanese language options, all for $29.99! Take that! 

Subscribe to the Official Capcom Unity Channel: 
http://bit.ly/Qjb2MV
